channel.title: 🏢 Berlin Institute for the Foundations of Learning and Data on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Berlin Institute for the Foundations of Learning and Data on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Breaking the curse of dimensionality in structured density estimation
item.description: Researchers break the curse of dimensionality in structured density estimation using graph resilience, a novel graphical parameter that effectively reduces the sample complexity.
